text: Di yi pa shɛli, o (Annabi Muhammadu) yi chɛn ya, o Duuma (Naawuni) nyɛla Ŋun yɛn taɣi o paɣa shɛba ban gari ya, ka bɛ nyɛ Muslinnima, ban ti Naawuni yɛlimaŋli, ban filindi bɛ maŋa n-tiri Naawuni, ban niŋdi tuuba, ban jɛmdi Naawuni, ban lɔri noli, paɣa shɛba ban gbaai kpamli, n-ti pahi paɣasara
